name: components/Button/index.js
components/Footer/index.js
components/Header/index.js
content:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import Button from 'components/Button'; import Translate from 'containers/Translate'; import logo from 'assets/logo.png'; import { logoPlaceholder } from 'constants/InlineSVGs'; require('./index.scss'); export default class Header extends Component { render() { return(

Carpenters’ Local 197

Washington D.C., Maryland, & Virginia

Home Entrada About Acerca De Contractors Contratistas Politics Politicas Standards Estandares Abuse Abuso Training Entrenamiento
); } }

name: components/Hero/index.js
Hero
description: Hero component with background picture and graphic.

unknown.tagValue: {!Array} children - Content inside of the tags to be displayed.
{!string} iconImage - The image that will be shown to the right of the content.
{?string} className - A class name for exra styling
{?string} backGroundImage - Background image of the hero component.

name: components/Input/index.js
Input

unknown.tagValue: {?string} title - The title of the input field.
{?string} titleEs - The title of the input field in spanish.

{?string} placeholder - Text to display in the input field when
                                   there is no text.
{?string} name - The name of the input field.
{?string} type - The type of the input field (text, email, password, etc.)
{!Object} content - Text to display in the input field as text.

{!function(e: {target: {value: string}}}): void} controlFunc -
                                     Function to update the content prop object.
{?function} onEnter - Function to run when the Enter key is pressed in the input field.
{?string} className - Class name to add a class to the component for extra styling.

name: components/Panel/index.js
components/SignIn/index.js

components/Text/index.js

content:
# United Brotherhood of Carpenter's Website
The official website of the United Brotherhood of Carpenter's Local 197.

![Build Status](https://codebuild.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/badges?uuid=eyJlbmNyeXB0ZWREYXRhIjoiay8yQjNzaTEveDVERlhsSEJxbk1TVzBoWDlWcmJJbTZmMHRkWk1DYk0xZCt5WnZpT2tBN09YdmpxUUdIbUNzNlJtOWtHZ0JPTVpYMzZDblc5WU1LY0wwPSIsIml2UGFyYW1ldGVyU3BlYyI6ImFEWXYxekRiNFdvN283NEciLCJtYXRlcmlhbFNldFNlcmlhbCI6MX0%3D&branch=master)

## Run Dev

1. `npm install` installs all the dependencies needed to build the site.
2. `npm run start:dev` builds your static assets and places them on the `dist/` folder.
3. Head to the URL on your command line to see the website, make changes for real-time updates.
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "website",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "United Brotherhood of Carpenter's Official Website",
  "main": "src/app.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "start:dev": "node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server  --open --history-api-fallback",
    "build": "./node_modules/.bin/webpack -p"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/Local197/website.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "serverless",
    "aws",
    "react",
    "redux"
  ],
  "author": "Jose Canahui",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/Local197/website/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/Local197/website#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-eslint": "^7.2.3",
    "eslint": "^4.4.0",
    "eslint-plugin-babel": "^4.1.2",
    "eslint-plugin-react": "^7.1.0",
    "redux-devtools": "^3.4.1",
    "stylelint": "^8.4.0",
    "stylelint-config-sass-guidelines": "^4.0.1",
    "stylelint-order": "^0.8.0",
    "stylelint-scss": "^2.2.0",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^2.10.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "aws-amplify": "^0.2.9",
    "aws-amplify-react": "^0.1.34",
    "babel-core": "^6.25.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.1",
    "babel-plugin-transform-react-jsx": "^6.24.1",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.0",
    "css-loader": "^0.28.4",
    "dotenv-webpack": "^1.5.4",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-jsx-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-react-plugin": "^1.0.1",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "extract-text-webpack-plugin": "^3.0.0",
    "file-loader": "^0.11.2",
    "html-webpack-plugin": "^2.30.1",
    "node-sass": "^4.5.3",
    "raw-loader": "^0.5.1",
    "react": "^16.0.0-beta.3",
    "react-cookie": "^2.1.2",
    "react-dom": "^16.0.0-beta.3",
    "react-redux": "^5.0.6",
    "react-responsive": "^1.3.4",
    "react-router-dom": "^4.1.2",
    "redux": "^3.7.2",
    "redux-thunk": "^2.2.0",
    "sass-loader": "^6.0.6",
    "style-loader": "^0.18.2",
    "svgo": "^0.7.2",
    "svgo-loader": "^1.2.1",
    "webpack": "^3.4.1"
  },
  "stylelint": {
    "extends": "stylelint-config-sass-guidelines",
    "plugins": "stylelint-scss",
    "rules": {
      "color-hex-case": "upper",
      "selector-no-qualifying-type": null,
      "selector-max-id": 1,
      "selector-class-pattern": null,
      "max-nesting-depth": null
    }
  },
  "esdoc": {
    "source": "./src/components",
    "destination": "./docs",
    "plugins": [
      {
        "name": "esdoc-standard-plugin",
        "option": {
          "brand": {
            "logo": "./src/assets/logo.png",
            "title": "Local 197 Webpage",
            "description": "This is a library for the Local 197 website components",
            "repository": "https://github.com/Local197/website",
            "site": "https://197-carpenters.com",
            "author": "https://www.canahui.me"
          }
        }
      },
      {
        "name": "esdoc-jsx-plugin"
      },
      {
        "name": "esdoc-react-plugin"
      }
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
